name: Intro to Vulpinian Skies
landing_text: A treatise on how to smoothly get started with the $(bold)Vulpinian Skies$(reset) lifestyle.$(br)$(br)(Work in Progress)

macros.$(machinery): Hover the munition and press [$(k:jei.showRecipe)] to see $(3)required machinery$(reset).
macros.$(workbench): Hover the frame and press [$(k:jei.showRecipe)] to see $(3)components and Sequenced Assembly$(reset).
macros.$(apparatus): Crafted via $(3)Enchanting Apparatus$(reset). Hover the munition and press [$(k:jei.showRecipe)] for more information.
